newsitem.title: USA: Thieves steal FBI van full of weapons.
newsitem.headline: Thieves steal FBI van full of weapons.

text.p: The FBI had a crime on its hands on Tuesday: One of its vans full of weapons was stolen and looted.
Agents said the van was found near Millington, Tennessee, outside Memphis Tuesday morning gutted by fire but empty of more than a dozen weapons including M-16 rifles and tear gas launchers.
A spokesman for the Memphis FBI office called it "an extremely serious situation" and promised that the weapons would be recovered.
The van belonged to a SWAT team of agents, one of several such teams attending a regional training exercise in Memphis.
